sentences.sentence: Some groups that had descended from the same parent population were no longer reproductively compatible—they had evolved into separate species.
sentences.translation: 一些由同一亲本群体进化而来的群体在繁殖上不再相容——他们进化成了不同的物种。

sentences.sentence: That small, reproductively isolated groups of people are susceptible to genetic disease is well known.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，生育范围越狭小的种族就越易患遗传疾病。

sentences.sentence: Boys, they reasoned, will thrive reproductively when they have grown big and strong in resource-rich environments.
sentences.translation: 他们认为在资源丰富的环境下，男性胚胎发育的高大而壮实，从而繁殖生存下来。
